context_bundle.content:
Authentication error handling.

Error Types:
- 401: Not authenticated
- 403: Not authorized
- Token expired
- Token invalid
- MFA required

Handling:
- Clear error messages (without leaking info)
- Automatic token refresh
- Graceful session expiry
- MFA flow handling

Security:
- Rate limit login attempts
- Log auth failures
- Alert on anomalies
- Invalidate compromised tokens
